original_text: Jonathan climbed up the rock wall on his hands and his feet. The young man climbed up behind him. Jonathan attacked and killed some of the Philistines. The young man followed behind Jonathan and killed more of them.
korean_text: 요나단이 손 발로 기어 올라갔고 그 무기를 든 자도 따랐더라 블레셋 사람들이 요나단 앞에서 엎드러지매 무기를 든 자가 따라가며 죽였으니

sentences.original_text: Jonathan climbed up the rock wall
on his hands and his feet
The young man climbed up behind him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 젊은이가 그의 뒤를 따라 올라갔습니다

sentences.original_text: Jonathan attacked and killed some of the Philistines
The young man followed behind Jonathan

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 중 더 많은 사람들을 죽였습니다
